name: RaceTrack AI Demo
description:
Prompt:

The studio is building out their racing game and wants to use the custom car system to populate the race with random AI vehicles. The system should work as follows: 

  • Generation of a certain user-selected amount (min6-max12) cars with random colors.
  • Automatic pathing around a racing scene, following a random route if there are multiple path options available. Racing should feel competitive, with cars accelerating at straightaways and braking into turns.
  • Cars should behave a little randomly, so that different cars pass each other.
  • Demonstrate the AI behavior in 2 different sample scenes (one standard oval track and one track with multiple path options) built with temp assets https://kenney.nl/assets/racing-kit
